attributes.action: Emphasize Accountablity of Corrupt and Corruption in Pakistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Corrupt and corruption has become a tendancy in Pakistan in almost every sphere of life and every Governmental Department. Low level government officials even to the rank of mail peon and postmen has attianed huge properties. Some clerks type people have taken the charge of various important positions on the support of tribal elders, all are eating flesh of poor people and sucking their blood. I request to emphasize Accountablity of Corrupt and Corruption in Pakistan irrespective of race, tribe, language, department and political affiliation.
